entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few showers ending early this evening then clearing. Snow level near valley bottom. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Snow level 1100 metres. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High 8. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Wind east 20 km/h. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 11 March 2023
